alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 2:57PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Graham and central Greenlee Counties through 415 PM MST... At 256 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 22 miles north of Thatcher to near Morenci to near Mule Creek. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Safford, Clifton, Thatcher, Solomon, Morenci, Roper Lake State Park, Safford Regional Airport, Pima, Duncan, Fort Thomas, Guthrie and Swift Trail Junction. This includes the following highways... Route 70 between mile markers 299 and 373, and between mile markers 375 and 377. Route 75 between mile markers 381 and 398. Route 78 between mile markers 155 and 174. Route 191 between mile markers 116 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
